verses.verse: וַיְהִ֛י <S%H1961><s%> came בְּעַשְׁתֵּֽי־ <S%H6249><s%> eleven עֶשְׂרֵ֥ה <S%H6240><s%> ten שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> year בְּאֶחָ֣ד <S%H259><s%> in the first לַחֹ֑דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> [day] of the month הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> [that] the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> Son אָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> of man יַ֠עַן <S%H3282><s%> because אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after אָ֨מְרָה <S%H559><s%> hath said צֹּ֤ר <S%H6865><s%> because that Tyrus עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning יְרוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <S%H3389><s%> against Jerusalem הֶאָ֔ח <S%H1889><s%> Aha נִשְׁבְּרָ֛ה <S%H7665><s%> she is broken דַּלְת֥וֹת <S%H1817><s%> [that was] the gates הָעַמִּ֖ים <S%H5971><s%> of the people נָסֵ֣בָּה <S%H5437><s%> she is turned אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> to me אִמָּלְאָ֖ה <S%H4390><s%> unto me I shall be replenished הָחֳרָֽבָה׃ <S%H2717><s%> [now] she is laid waste

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> therefore כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD הִנְנִ֥י <S%H2005><s%> behold עָלַ֖יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> I am against צֹ֑ר <S%H6865><s%> Behold I [am] against thee O Tyrus וְהַעֲלֵיתִ֤י <S%H5927><s%> to come up עָלַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H5921><s%> against גּוֹיִ֣ם <S%H1471><s%> nations רַבִּ֔ים <S%H7227><s%> and will cause many כְּהַעֲל֥וֹת <S%H5927><s%> to come up הַיָּ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> against thee as the sea לְגַלָּֽיו׃ <S%H1530><s%> causeth his waves

וְשִׁחֲת֞וּ <S%H7843><s%> And they shall destroy חֹמ֣וֹת <S%H2346><s%> the walls צֹ֗ר <S%H6865><s%> of Tyrus וְהָֽרְסוּ֙ <S%H2040><s%> and break down מִגְדָּלֶ֔יהָ <S%H4026><s%> her towers וְסִֽחֵיתִ֥י <S%H5500><s%> I will also scrape עֲפָרָ֖הּ <S%H6083><s%> her dust מִמֶּ֑נָּה <S%H4480><s%> from וְנָתַתִּ֥י <S%H5414><s%> from her and make אוֹתָ֖הּ <S%H853><s%> לִצְחִ֥יחַ <S%H6706><s%> her like the top סָֽלַע׃ <S%H5553><s%> of a rock

מִשְׁטַ֨ח <S%H4894><s%> It shall be [a place for] the spreading חֲרָמִ֤ים <S%H2764><s%> of nets תִּֽהְיֶה֙ <S%H1961><s%> will become בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst הַיָּ֔ם <S%H3220><s%> of the sea כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I דִבַּ֔רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> for I have spoken נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> [it] saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD וְהָיְתָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> will become לְבַ֖ז <S%H957><s%> and it shall become a spoil לַגּוֹיִֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> to the nations

וּבְנוֹתֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H1323><s%> And her daughters אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who בַּשָּׂדֶ֔ה <S%H7704><s%> which [are] in the field בַּחֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> by the sword תֵּהָרַ֑גְנָה <S%H2026><s%> shall be slain וְיָדְע֖וּ <S%H3045><s%> and they shall know כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD פ

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For כֹ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> For thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD הִנְנִ֧י <S%H2005><s%> behold מֵבִ֣יא <S%H935><s%> Behold I will bring אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> upon צֹ֗ר <S%H6865><s%> upon Tyrus נְבוּכַדְרֶאצַּ֧ר <S%H5019><s%> Nebuchadrezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king בָּבֶ֛ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon מִצָּפ֖וֹן <S%H6828><s%> from the north מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> a king מְלָכִ֑ים <S%H4428><s%> of kings בְּס֛וּס <S%H5483><s%> with horses וּבְרֶ֥כֶב <S%H7393><s%> and with chariots וּבְפָרָשִׁ֖ים <S%H6571><s%> and with horsemen וְקָהָ֥ל <S%H6951><s%> and companies וְעַם־ <S%H5971><s%> people רָֽב׃ <S%H7227><s%> and much

בְּנוֹתַ֥יִךְ <S%H1323><s%> thy daughters בַּשָּׂדֶ֖ה <S%H7704><s%> in the field בַּחֶ֣רֶב <S%H2719><s%> with the sword יַהֲרֹ֑ג <S%H2026><s%> He shall slay וְנָתַ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> and he shall make עָלַ֜יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> against דָּיֵ֗ק <S%H1785><s%> a fort וְשָׁפַ֤ךְ <S%H8210><s%> against thee and cast עָלַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H5921><s%> against סֹֽלְלָ֔ה <S%H5550><s%> a mount וְהֵקִ֥ים <S%H6965><s%> against thee and lift up עָלַ֖יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> against צִנָּֽה׃ <S%H6793><s%> the buckler

וּמְחִ֣י <S%H4239><s%> engines קָֽבָלּ֔וֹ <S%H6904><s%> of war יִתֵּ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> And he shall set בְּחֹֽמוֹתָ֑יִךְ <S%H2346><s%> against thy walls וּמִ֨גְדְּלֹתַ֔יִךְ <S%H4026><s%> thy towers יִתֹּ֖ץ <S%H5422><s%> he shall break down בְּחַרְבוֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H2719><s%> and with his axes

מִשִּׁפְעַ֥ת <S%H8229><s%> By reason of the abundance סוּסָ֖יו <S%H5483><s%> of his horses יְכַסֵּ֣ךְ <S%H3680><s%> shall cover אֲבָקָ֑ם <S%H80><s%> their dust מִקּוֹל֩ <S%H6963><s%> at the noise פָּרַ֨שׁ <S%H6571><s%> of the horsemen וְגַלְגַּ֜ל <S%H1534><s%> and of the wheels וָרֶ֗כֶב <S%H7393><s%> and of the chariots תִּרְעַ֙שְׁנָה֙ <S%H7493><s%> shall shake חֽוֹמוֹתַ֔יִךְ <S%H2346><s%> thee thy walls בְּבֹאוֹ֙ <S%H935><s%> when he shall enter בִּשְׁעָרַ֔יִךְ <S%H8179><s%> into thy gates כִּמְבוֹאֵ֖י <S%H3996><s%> as men enter עִ֥יר <S%H5892><s%> into a city מְבֻקָּעָֽה׃ <S%H1234><s%> wherein is made a breach

בְּפַרְס֣וֹת <S%H6541><s%> With the hoofs סוּסָ֔יו <S%H5483><s%> of his horses יִרְמֹ֖ס <S%H7429><s%> shall he tread down אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all חֽוּצוֹתָ֑יִךְ <S%H2351><s%> all thy streets עַמֵּךְ֙ <S%H5971><s%> thy people בַּחֶ֣רֶב <S%H2719><s%> by the sword יַהֲרֹ֔ג <S%H2026><s%> he shall slay וּמַצְּב֥וֹת <S%H4676><s%> garrisons עֻזֵּ֖ךְ <S%H5797><s%> and thy strong לָאָ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> to the ground תֵּרֵֽד׃ <S%H3381><s%> shall go down

וְשָׁלְל֣וּ <S%H7997><s%> And they shall make a spoil חֵילֵ֗ךְ <S%H2428><s%> of thy riches וּבָֽזְזוּ֙ <S%H962><s%> and make a prey רְכֻלָּתֵ֔ךְ <S%H7404><s%> of thy merchandise וְהָֽרְסוּ֙ <S%H2040><s%> and they shall break down חוֹמוֹתַ֔יִךְ <S%H2346><s%> thy walls וּבָתֵּ֥י <S%H1004><s%> houses חֶמְדָּתֵ֖ךְ <S%H2532><s%> thy pleasant יִתֹּ֑צוּ <S%H5422><s%> and destroy וַאֲבָנַ֤יִךְ <S%H68><s%> thy stones וְעֵצַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H6086><s%> and thy timber וַֽעֲפָרֵ֔ךְ <S%H6083><s%> and thy dust בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst מַ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> of the water יָשִֽׂימוּ׃ <S%H7760><s%> and they shall lay

וְהִשְׁבַּתִּ֖י <S%H7673><s%> to cease הֲמ֣וֹן <S%H1995><s%> And I will cause the noise שִׁירָ֑יִךְ <S%H7892><s%> of thy songs וְק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> and the sound כִּנּוֹרַ֔יִךְ <S%H3658><s%> of thy harps לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> no יִשָּׁמַ֖ע <S%H8085><s%> shall be no more heard עֽוֹד׃ <S%H5750><s%> more

וּנְתַתִּ֞יךְ <S%H5414><s%> And I will make לִצְחִ֣יחַ <S%H6706><s%> thee like the top סֶ֗לַע <S%H5553><s%> of a rock מִשְׁטַ֤ח <S%H4894><s%> upon חֲרָמִים֙ <S%H2764><s%> nets תִּֽהְיֶ֔ה <S%H1961><s%> become לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> no תִבָּנֶ֖ה <S%H1129><s%> thou shalt be built ע֑וֹד <S%H5750><s%> more כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אֲנִ֤י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָה֙ <S%H3069><s%> GOD דִּבַּ֔רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> have spoken נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> [it] saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> no more for I the LORD ס

כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֛ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD לְצ֑וֹר <S%H6865><s%> to Tyrus הֲלֹ֣א ׀ <S%H3808><s%> at מִקּ֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> at the sound מַפַּלְתֵּ֗ךְ <S%H4658><s%> of thy fall בֶּאֱנֹ֨ק <S%H602><s%> cry חָלָ֜ל <S%H2491><s%> when the wounded בֵּהָ֤רֵֽג <S%H2026><s%> is made הֶ֙רֶג֙ <S%H2027><s%> when the slaughter בְּתוֹכֵ֔ךְ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst יִרְעֲשׁ֖וּ <S%H7493><s%> shake הָאִיִּֽים׃ <S%H339><s%> Shall not the isles

וְֽיָרְד֞וּ <S%H3381><s%> shall come down מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> from כִּסְאוֹתָ֗ם <S%H3678><s%> from their thrones כֹּ֚ל <S%H3605><s%> all נְשִׂיאֵ֣י <S%H5387><s%> Then all the princes הַיָּ֔ם <S%H3220><s%> of the sea וְהֵסִ֙ירוּ֙ <S%H5493><s%> and lay away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מְעִ֣ילֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H4598><s%> their robes וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בִּגְדֵ֥י <S%H899><s%> garments רִקְמָתָ֖ם <S%H7553><s%> their broidered יִפְשֹׁ֑טוּ <S%H6584><s%> and put off חֲרָד֤וֹת ׀ <S%H2731><s%> themselves with trembling יִלְבָּ֙שׁוּ֙ <S%H3847><s%> they shall clothe עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> upon the ground יֵשֵׁ֔בוּ <S%H3427><s%> they shall sit וְחָֽרְדוּ֙ <S%H2729><s%> and shall tremble לִרְגָעִ֔ים <S%H7281><s%> at [every] moment וְשָׁמְמ֖וּ <S%H8074><s%> and be astonished עָלָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

וְנָשְׂא֨וּ <S%H5375><s%> And they shall take up עָלַ֤יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> over קִינָה֙ <S%H7015><s%> a lamentation וְאָ֣מְרוּ <S%H559><s%> for thee and say לָ֔ךְ אֵ֣יךְ <S%H349><s%> How אָבַ֔דְתְּ <S%H6><s%> to thee How art thou destroyed נוֹשֶׁ֖בֶת <S%H3427><s%> [that wast] inhabited מִיַּמִּ֑ים <S%H3220><s%> of seafaring men הָעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> city הַהֻלָּ֗לָה <S%H1984><s%> the renowned אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> Which הָיְתָ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> become חֲזָקָ֤ה <S%H2389><s%> which wast strong בַיָּם֙ <S%H3220><s%> in the sea הִ֣יא <S%H1931><s%> and her וְיֹשְׁבֶ֔יהָ <S%H3427><s%> she and her inhabitants אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> Who נָתְנ֥וּ <S%H5414><s%> which cause חִתִּיתָ֖ם <S%H2851><s%> their terror לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יוֹשְׁבֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H3427><s%> [to be] on all that haunt

עַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> Now יֶחְרְד֣וּ <S%H2729><s%> tremble הָֽאִיִּ֔ן <S%H339><s%> Now shall the isles י֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day מַפַּלְתֵּ֑ךְ <S%H4658><s%> of thy fall וְנִבְהֲל֛וּ <S%H926><s%> shall be troubled הָאִיִּ֥ים <S%H339><s%> yea the isles אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which בַּיָּ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> that [are] in the sea מִצֵּאתֵֽךְ׃ <S%H3318><s%> at thy departure ס

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For כֹ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> For thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD בְּתִתִּ֤י <S%H5414><s%> When I shall make אֹתָךְ֙ <S%H853><s%> עִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> city נֶחֱרֶ֔בֶת <S%H2717><s%> thee a desolate כֶּעָרִ֖ים <S%H5892><s%> like the cities אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> are not נוֹשָׁ֑בוּ <S%H3427><s%> that are not inhabited בְּהַעֲל֤וֹת <S%H5927><s%> when I shall bring up עָלַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H5921><s%> over אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תְּה֔וֹם <S%H8415><s%> the deep וְכִסּ֖וּךְ <S%H3680><s%> shall cover הַמַּ֥יִם <S%H4325><s%> waters הָרַבִּֽים׃ <S%H7227><s%> upon thee and great

וְהוֹרַדְתִּיךְ֩ <S%H3381><s%> When I shall bring thee down אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for י֨וֹרְדֵי <S%H3381><s%> with them that descend ב֜וֹר <S%H953><s%> into the pit אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עַ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> with the people עוֹלָ֗ם <S%H5769><s%> of old time וְ֠הוֹשַׁבְתִּיךְ <S%H3427><s%> and shall set בְּאֶ֨רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth תַּחְתִּיּ֜וֹת <S%H8482><s%> thee in the low parts כָּחֳרָב֤וֹת <S%H2723><s%> in places desolate מֵֽעוֹלָם֙ <S%H5769><s%> of old אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for י֣וֹרְדֵי <S%H3381><s%> with them that go down ב֔וֹר <S%H953><s%> to the pit לְמַ֖עַן <S%H4616><s%> so לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not תֵשֵׁ֑בִי <S%H3427><s%> that thou be not inhabited וְנָתַתִּ֥י <S%H5414><s%> and I shall set צְבִ֖י <S%H6643><s%> glory בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land חַיִּֽים׃ <S%H2416><s%> of the living

בַּלָּה֥וֹת <S%H1091><s%> thee a terror אֶתְּנֵ֖ךְ <S%H5414><s%> I will make וְאֵינֵ֑ךְ <S%H369><s%> will be no וּֽתְבֻקְשִׁ֗י <S%H1245><s%> and thou [shalt be] no [more] though thou be sought for וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not תִמָּצְאִ֥י <S%H4672><s%> be found עוֹד֙ <S%H5750><s%> again לְעוֹלָ֔ם <S%H5769><s%> yet shalt thou never נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> again saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהֹוִֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> GOD ס
